changelog:
====================
Changelog 2019-01-28
=========================

* 
Launcher3: Add more options for icon sizes
* Launcher3: Fix hide apps menu glitches
* 
Launcher3: Hide apps activity improvements
* 
Launcher3: Add updated Google Feed lib from Pixel 3 launcher
* 
NetworkTraffic: Replace arrows drawable with unicode symbols
* 
NetworkTraffic: Fix speed unit (We have B, KB, MB per second)
* 
Settings: Allow sorting applications by size
* 
Improve app info screen
* 
Fix a crash when launching app detail for bad package name
* 
Update backuptool from LineageOS
* 
Define Google Assistant as default assist app
* 
Grant Google sounds picker storage permissions
* 
Add support for the .opus file format (simply add the file extension as a type of Ogg file, which it is)
* 
Fix disappearing home/recents button on navigation bar
* 
Fixed min frequency bug
* 
F2FS support
* 
Blobs updated
* 
Latest derp kernel
* 
DownloadProvider: Fixed a bug where download content was deleted if download folder was renamed
* 
DownloadProvider: Allow more redirects
* 
DownloadProvider: Stop download from sites with invalid certificate
* 
NOS upstreams and minor improvements
